boost::logging::scenario::usage::logger_::change::set_once_when_multiple_threads

boost::logging::scenario::usage::logger_::change::set_once_when_multiple_threads Struct Reference

Set only once, when there could be multiple thread running. More...

Detailed Description

Set only once, when there could be multiple thread running.

We automatically implement a strategy to check if the filter/logger has been initialized, and when it's done, we cache the result on every thread
